normalised: Namaste folks, and welcome back to your daily dose of masala! This week, the Bollywood gossip mill has been churning like a Lucknowi biryani pot on Eid. Let's dive right in, shall we?

unnormalised: Namaste folks, and welcome back to your daily dose of masala! This week, the Bollywood gossip mill has been churning like a Lucknowi biryani pot on Eid. Let's dive right in, shall we?
normalised: First up, whispers are flying around about Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor possibly taking a break? Sources close to the couple say they've been spending more time apart, Alia focusing on her Dharma Productions commitments and Ranbir immersed in some hush-hush project. Could this be more than just a professional divergence? Only time will tell, but my chai is getting cold just thinking about it. Remember what happened with Salman and Aishwarya way back when? Drama, drama, drama!

normalised: Then there's the ever-glamorous Deepika Padukone, spotted leaving a fancy restaurant in Bandra with a mystery man. Paparazzi went wild! Some are saying it's a new business partner, others are hinting at a rekindled romance from her pre-Ranveer days. Maybe it's just a cousin from Bangalore, yaar! The suspense is killing me.

normalised: Speaking of romances, is something brewing between Ananya Pandey and Aditya Roy Kapur? They were seen laughing and joking at Karan Johar’s recent party. We all know what *Koffee with Karan* does to relationships! Remember those uncomfortable Sara-Kartik promotions? Yikes!

normalised: Lastly, remember that rumour of Ranveer Singh getting a nose job? The internet is abuzz again after someone posted a "before and after" pic, claiming subtle changes. Look, the guy's a style icon. Maybe he just contoured differently! Or maybe the plastic surgeon at Kokilaben Dhirubhai Ambani Hospital did a little magic. Who are we to judge?

normalised: Anyway, that's all the steaming hot gossip for today. Keep your ears to the ground and your eyes on the red carpets. Until next time, keep it filmi! Don't forget to like and subscribe. Adios!
